analytic.title: A Book on Arabic Inflexion According to the System of the Greeks: A Lost Work by Ḥunayn b. Isḥāq

biblStruct.note: An edition and translation of a treatise on Arabic inflexion that uses concepts and terminology characteristic of the philosophical-logical tradition of language description and the Greek grammatical tradition. I suggest that the treatise is a lost grammar of Arabic by the famous translator Ḥunayn b. Isḥāq.
